LanguageData.RC2_ZopeHigh.label: high on zope
LanguageData.RC2_ZopeHigh.description: Zope exhausts a pawn while also decreasing pain slightly. Staying too long on zope can cause lung problems and cancer.
LanguageData.RC2_ZopeHigh.stages.zope_high.label: zope high
LanguageData.RC2_ZopioidAddiction.label: zopioid addiction
LanguageData.RC2_ZopioidAddiction.description: The pawn is now reliant on Zopoid, causing increased pain, tiredness, and stress on the pawn.
LanguageData.RC2_ZopioidTolerance.label: zopioid tolerance
LanguageData.RC2_ZopioidTolerance.description: Taking too many zopoid products in too short of time can cause severe chemical damage in the liver and brain.
LanguageData.RC2_ZopioidTolerance.stages.small.label: small
LanguageData.RC2_ZopioidTolerance.stages.large.label: large
